originalText.text: There are great people doing great work here.

originalText.text: I went to this place for a trip on 10/30/17. One thing I have to say is that they are not prepared. Why I say that is that I was the only kid that did not  go to the other part. The other part was the SS part. But my whole class got to go but I did not. Why this happened in because some kids get to go to the other part first. I was not in that part. So when the kids came back all of us who did not go. But the girl who worked said only one kid can go from each group. But my other classmates went and when he came back our trip was over. For that I should get back all of my money. The worst trip I ever went to.‚òπüò†üëé I am very mad. Also in this trip all they do is talk and talk. First a man talks. Then a woman talks. I should get a free pass or my money back because of what happened. Also something that got me mad is that the trip took 1 hour and 30 minutes to go and to come back.  Give me my money back!üëéüò†‚òπüëé

text.text: I went to this place for a trip on 10/30/17. One thing I have to say is that they are not prepared. Why I say that is that I was the only kid that did not  go to the other part. The other part was the SS part. But my whole class got to go but I did not. Why this happened in because some kids get to go to the other part first. I was not in that part. So when the kids came back all of us who did not go. But the girl who worked said only one kid can go from each group. But my other classmates went and when he came back our trip was over. For that I should get back all of my money. The worst trip I ever went to.‚òπüò†üëé I am very mad. Also in this trip all they do is talk and talk. First a man talks. Then a woman talks. I should get a free pass or my money back because of what happened. Also something that got me mad is that the trip took 1 hour and 30 minutes to go and to come back.  Give me my money back!üëéüò†‚òπüëé

originalText.text: I‚Äôm appalled at the lengths NASA Goddard Institute has gone to rob Mikayla, Bria and India of their rightful win in the glog contest ending today. If they had been supported in their rightful victory in this round and then not chosen by the judges later on I might have been able to deal with that. But erasing their lead with SEVENTY EIGHT PERCENT OF THE VOTES and then closing voting early in the grade 9-12 division while keeping polls open for the other grades? You couldn‚Äôt be anymore transparent. STEM is a difficult enough field to get into as it is when you‚Äôre a woman or a person of color and you chose to pull the rug out from 3 doubly marginalized KIDS. Then when folks started asking about it you closed your Facebook reviews. You should be ASHAMED. Those kids deserved better.

If they had been supported in their rightful victory in this round and then not chosen by the judges later on I might have been able to deal with that. But erasing their lead with SEVENTY EIGHT PERCENT OF THE VOTES and then closing voting early in the grade 9-12 division while keeping polls open for the other grades? You couldn‚Äôt be anymore transparent. STEM is a difficult enough field to get into as it is when you‚Äôre a woman or a person of color and you chose to pull the rug out from 3 doubly marginalized KIDS. Then when folks started asking about it you closed your Facebook reviews. You should be ASHAMED. Those kids deserved better.
